en: The stars that once lit up the entire universe
es: Las estrellas que alguna vez iluminaron todo el universo

en: Since the stars disappeared
A long time has passed.
Zzz...
...What’s going on, there’s nothing here but all of a sudden...
es: ...¿Qué pasa? Aquí no hay nada, pero de repente...

en: I hear a sound coming from somewhere...!
...This is bad!
It’s space bugs!
We need to get out of here quickly!
Auch!
Ahh! The engine is about to break...
es: ¡Ahh! El motor está a punto de romperse...

en:
It’s a portal!
It should be safer than here... right?
es:
¡Es un portal!
Será más seguro que aquí... ¿verdad?

en: Aahh-!!
Whew~ Survived.
But who opened this portal?
Who are you...?
Oh my... it’s the Star Tree...! The Star Tree!!
es: ¡Oh, cielos... es el Árbol Estrella...! ¡El Árbol Estrella!

kr: 내가 찾아다니던 그 별나무라니! 드디어 찾았어!!
en: The Star Tree I’ve been searching for!\nI’ve finally found it!!
es: ¡El Árbol Estrella que buscaba!\n¡Finalmente lo encontré!

kr: 안녕! 혹시 네가 나를 구해 준 거야? 고마워!
en: Hi! Did you save me by any chance? Thank you!
Hi... I’m glad you’re safe...
es: Hola... Me alegra que estés a salvo...

en: ...Are you okay? You look really exhausted.
No... I’m fine... perfectly okay...
Ahh! No! Don’t wither!

kr: 미안...포탈 여는 데 힘을 다 써서...그래도 너를 구했으니까...
en: I’m sorry... I used all my strength opening the portal... but at least I saved you...
es: Lo siento... usé toda mi fuerza abriendo el portal... pero al menos los salvé...

en: No! I just barely found you...!

kr: 별나무의 힘...그래, 별꿀! 별꿀을 모아야 해!
en: The power of the Star Tree... right, Star Honey! We need to collect Star Honey!
es: El poder del Árbol Estrella... ¡Claro, Miel Estrella! ¡Debemos recolectar Miel Estrella!

kr: 어딘가에 별꽃 씨앗이 남아 있을지도 몰라! 서두르자!
en: There might still be Star Flower seeds somewhere! Let’s hurry!
es: ¡Quizás aún queden semillas de la Flor Estrella en algún lugar! ¡Vamos rápido!

en: Huh... what? Is this... Star Honey?
Phew...! You’ve regained your strength. Thank goodness.

kr: 네가 별꿀을 구해 준 거야...? 우와! 정말 고마워!
en: Did you brought the Star Honey...? Wow! Thank you so much!

kr: 그런데 도대체 어떻게 구한거야? 이 근처에 별꽃은 더 이상 없을 텐데!
en: But how did you even get it? There shouldn’t be any Star Flowers left around here!
es: ¿Pero cómo la consiguieron? ¡Ya no debería haber Flores Estrella por aquí!

kr: 다행히 여기에 아직 싹을 틔우지 못한 씨앗들이 남아 있더라고.
en: Luckily, there were still some seeds that hadn’t sprouted yet.
es: Afortunadamente, aún quedaban semillas que no habían brotado.

kr: 이렇게 말라버린 땅에서 꽃을 피웠다고? 대단해!
en: You made them bloom in this dry land? That’s amazing!
Who are you, anyway?
I’m Ribee.
Nice to meet you! I’m Alta.

kr: 너는 어쩌다 그 위험한 곳을 떠돌고 있었던 거야?
en: How did you end up wandering around in that dangerous place?
es: ¿Cómo terminaste vagando por ese lugar peligroso?

kr: 나는 정말 오랫동안 별나무를 찾아서 여행 중이었어!
en: I’ve been traveling for a long time, searching for the Star Tree!
es: ¡He estado viajando mucho tiempo buscando el Árbol Estrella!

en: A Star Tree like you, Alta!
What? You were looking for me? Why?

kr: 왜긴! 새로운 별을 키우고 우주를 구하기 위해서지!
en: Why? To grow new stars and save the universe, of course!
es: ¿Por qué? ¡Para hacer crecer nuevas estrellas y salvar el universo, por supuesto!

en: New stars...? Save the universe...?
Wow! That sounds amazing!

kr: 그치! 상상해 봐, 네 가지에 맺혀있던 별이 우주를 다시 채우는 모습을...
en: Right! Imagine, the stars that once grew on your branches filling the universe again...
es: ¡Exacto! Imagina, las estrellas que crecían en tus ramas llenando el universo de nuevo...

en: Hmm... wow...

kr: 앗...! 그런데 어쩌지...? 나는 아직 별이 맺힐 가지가 없는데...
en: Oh...! But what should I do...? I don’t have any branches for stars yet...
es: Oh... ¡Pero qué hago...? No tengo ramas donde crezcan las estrellas aún...

kr: 별이 부서지고 별꿀이 다 말라버린 뒤론 전혀 자라지 못해서...
en: Ever since the stars broke and all the Star Honey dried up, I haven’t been able to grow at all...
es: Desde que las estrellas se rompieron y toda la Miel Estrella se secó, no he podido crecer...

en: Hmm... what should I do in a time like this...
es: Hmm... ¿qué debería hacer en este momento...?

en: ...Ah! I have a great idea!

kr: 알타, 혹시 아직 별꽃이 필 만한 다른 땅을 찾아줄 수 있어?
en: Alta, could you perhaps find another place where Star Flowers might bloom?
es: Alta, ¿podrías encontrar otro lugar donde florezcan las Flores Estrella?

en: I’ll gather Star Honey for you.
...Really?
Of course! Just trust me!
Got it! Wait for me just a moment!

kr: 으음...한 군데 있긴 한데...우주 벌레들이 주변에 잔뜩 있어.
en: Hmm... there is one place, but there are a lot of space bugs around it.
es: Hmm... hay un lugar, pero está lleno de insectos espaciales alrededor.

kr: 하지만 걱정 마! 내 포탈을 타고 가면 다치지 않게 지켜 줄 수 있어!
en: But don’t worry! If you take my portal, I can protect you so you won’t get hurt!
es: ¡Pero no te preocupes! Si usas mi portal, puedo protegerte para que no te hagas daño.

en: What? Is that really true?
Yes! Just trust me!

kr: ...아직 오랫동안은 힘들지만, 그래도 나한테 맡겨 줘!
en: ...It’ll be difficult for a long time, but still, leave it to me!
es: ...Aún será difícil por un tiempo, pero déjamelo a mí.

en: Okay! Alta, I’ll count on you!
